name: Math Gardener III
blurb: Be a part of bringing a fun and simple math practice game to more platforms with better graphics.

rewards.reward: Helpful Supporter - Every pledge receives an electronic copy of the game for one of the platforms that we release it on.

Beginning Gardener - Every pledge receives an electronic copy of the game for one of the platforms that we release it on. Even though everyone will get a copy of the final game if you pledge more you can help the funding succeed so we can finish the game sooner. Your name will be in the credits in the game under the Beginning Gardener section.

Early Bird Gardener - The first backer of Math Gardener III gave me the idea to add this special reward. The next 10 backers who take this reward will get a special place in the credits near the beginning. You will receive all of the $5 reward except your place in the credits will be in the Early Bird section near the very beginning.

Gardener - Every pledge receives an electronic copy of the game for one of the platforms that we release it on. Even though everyone will get a copy of the final game if you pledge more you can help the funding succeed so we can finish the game sooner.  Your name will be in the credits in the game under the Gardener section.

Advanced Gardener - Every pledge receives an electronic copy of the game for one of the platforms that we release it on. Even though everyone will get a copy of the final game if you pledge more you can help the funding succeed so we can finish the game sooner. Your name will be in the credits in the game under the Advanced Gardener section.

Elite Gardener - Every pledge receives an electronic copy of the game for one of the platforms that we release it on. Even though everyone will get a copy of the final game if you pledge more you can help the funding succeed so we can finish the game sooner. Your name will be in the credits in the game under the Elite Gardener section.

Master Gardener - Every pledge receives an electronic copy of the game for one of the platforms that we release it on. Even though everyone will get a copy of the final game if you pledge more you can help the funding succeed so we can finish the game sooner. Your name will be in the credits in the game under the Master Gardener section. This title is actually a real title that a gardener in the real world can earn by training with the local county extension in Weber County Utah. It takes quite a bit of work. This reward is not saying you have achieved that in the real world. It just shows your level of commitment to this project.

Garden Pot Supporter - Every pledge receives an electronic copy of the game for one of the platforms that we release it on. Even though everyone will get a copy of the final game if you pledge more you can help the funding succeed so we can finish the game sooner. Most importantly you will get to name one of the 4 pots in the game. The name has to be appropriate for a kids math game and we will have the right to refuse your name. We will give you plenty of opportunities to negotiate a name that will work. Your name will also appear in the credits in the game under this very special section.
